doc.after: Null has been the focus of controversy and a source of debate because of its associated three valued logic 3VL special requirements for its use in SQL joins and the special handling required by aggregate functions and SQL grouping operators Although special functions and predicates are provided to properly handle Nulls opponents feel that resolving these issues introduces unnecessary complexity and inconsistency into the relational model of databases
